channel.title: Can't load any patch from library: Message:"Compiling patch failed"
channel.description:
Hi, I am totally new to Axoloti. This is my first attempt to connect it to my MacMini. Connection box is checked: Ok SD card is mounted: Ok When trying to load any patch from the library , I always get the same message: "shell task failed, exit value: 2 (THIS IS IN RED) "Compiling patch failed"
I cannot go "Live".....
When checking the contents of the SD card, I can see the folders of the patches I tried to upload, but can't see any contents in the folders.....
ps: I am a total computer dummy .... ps2: @Johannes: Ik ben een Vlaming, dus je mag gerust in het vlaams antwoorden.
Thanks!

item.title: Can't load any patch from library: Message:"Compiling patch failed"
item.dc:creator: @William William
item.description:
@William wrote:

Hi!

I have the same message when trying to use the patch/patcher... I even tried to uninstall the app, and redownload it starting with the runtime to be sure, and nothing happenend... Can you help me? Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load any patch from library: Message:"Compiling patch failed"
item.dc:creator: @carlovaes carlo
item.description:
@carlovaes wrote:

@technobear: Thanks a lot..... It works!
I downloaded the runtime, but didn't copy it in the app folder.....
Great service! I owe you one

Read full topic
item.source: Can't load any patch from library: Message:"Compiling patch failed"

item.title: Can't load any patch from library: Message:"Compiling patch failed"
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Id need to see more of the console messages ....
but it looks to me like you have not installed the axoloti runtime.
(or have installed it incorrectly)

Installing on Mac OS X User Guide
Normal Installation To reduce size we split the application into two parts, the main axoloti application, and a runtime which contains other required files. You must download and install both initially. (Usually updates will only require the main application to be downloaded and installed.) download both application bundle and axoloti_runtime go to http://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases, you will see the 'latest release' download axo_runtime_osx_(version).dmg download axoloti_osx_(versâ€¦

pay particular attention to step 2.

Read full topic

Hi,
I am totally new to Axoloti. This is my first attempt to connect it to my MacMini.

SD card is mounted: Ok
When trying to load any patch from the library , I always get the same message:
"shell task failed, exit value: 2 (THIS IS IN RED)

ps: I am a total computer dummy ....
